mention.text: panama city , 21 mar 90 -- the panamanian government
foreign minister dr. julio e. linares
the mexican embassy in panama city
rafael arosemena , former manager of the national bank of panama
former majors in the now defunct defense forces
the peruvian embassy in panama city
either of these countries , which insist on keeping former collaborators of former gen noriega as refugees

refugees at the ecuadoran embassy : former public works minister rene bultron , former labor minister cesar martans , former national mortgage bank manager julio shaik , former irhe director leovigildo herrrera , and former tourism director bernardo dominguez
